channel.title: Gauntlet Facilitator Camp Capybara, November 2020
channel.description: **Gauntlet Facilitator Camp Capybara, November 2020** Saturday evenings in November starting at 8 p.m. Central time (6 p.m. Pacific, 7 p.m. Mountain, 9 p.m. Eastern) RSVPing to this session commits you to the other three sessions occurring in November on Saturdays at this time. https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MIAqvtg9QrED2P7MGDe
